storyInfo: When they awaken, the group finds the world completely back to normal, as if the disastrous events of the previous day never happened. Lava and her cohorts go directly to Dawn the Shopkeeper, who over the course of a conversation explains the 'rules' of this place.

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Did I fall asleep?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, now I remember... I was helping count the casualties till late last night, and I went straight to bed after I got back...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Looks like the sunrise and sunset have gone back to normal...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Kroos, wake up!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Hfff...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Kr—oo—s—!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ngh... guh.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: *Yawn*... Morning, Lava...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I've been meaning to ask, but how do you manage to sleep so well with that crossbow as a hug pillow?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Well, sleep is... important... yep~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hnn—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Okay, let me wash my face.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I wish you could be this stoked about getting up back at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Not happening~ We're on the job right now. I don't do this on my days off~
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We need to help them rebuild...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hey, Lava...? I'm not dreaming now, am I? Who's that outside the window?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Mommy, mommy! Hurry! We'll be late for story time!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Okay, okay. Slow down now, or you'll hurt yourself.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll be fine! Hurry up!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I-Is that her mother...? Her mother's okay?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Uh, maybe...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Look at the roof over there. I could swear the eaves were damaged by Arts yesterday.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You're kidding...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Rice cakes fresh out of the steamer! Packed with sesame filling!
attributes.name: Villager A

attributes.content: Sweet rice! Come get your fermented sweet rice right here!
attributes.name: Villager B

attributes.content: What's going on...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hmm... Everything's back to normal?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: My benefactors?!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: My benefactors, you remember me, do you not? Please tell me this is not a nightmare!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Slow down, what are you—
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, thank goodness you two remember me! Please, hear me out. When I woke up, it was as though everything that had transpired yesterday had never occurred! Everything was in perfect order!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: The Ink Spirits attacked? Families devastated? None of it ever happened! Look, even Ah Jan's mother is walking around in one piece, hale and whole! Gave me quite a start, I tell you! I thought I'd come upon a ghost in broad daylight—
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: —Right! Have you perchance seen the wandering monk, Saga? Where is she? Is she well?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: I haven't seen her yet—Oh, hello, Ah Jan.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Why, hello, Little Ah Jan~!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Hm? Who are you, Mister? How do you know my name?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: My benefactors, look! This is exactly what I meant!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Hey, Ah Jan, we're here to listen to Mr. Umbrella-Boiler's stories. How come story time is over already?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh, I see. The storyteller is sick today. My mommy is staying to help take care of him. Most of the people who came for his stories are staying to help, too.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: That's a shame.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It really is!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Ah Jan? This gentleman actually missed the session yesterday. Do you remember what the story was about?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I wasn't here yesterday. I was flying my kite with my mommy the whole day.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: That's too bad, then. It looks like you're out of luck.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: H-Haha... Little Ah Jan? You don't know me? You must be playing!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Who are you, Mister? Oh, you must be the one who just moved into the house down the street!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: N-Never you mind. Please, go on, frolic as you do...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Hm? Okay. See you, mister!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Why are we the only ones who remember anything...?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: No idea, but look at how cheerful she is. This isn't so bad.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Well... *Sigh*... That I certainly have no qualms with, but, my benefactor, are you not being a little too... calm?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Is this what the clerk meant when she said that... fishing the moon in the water thing?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Anyway, I think... I have a pretty good guess where Saga is.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh my! This sesame soup is unlike anything I've ever tasted! Simply exquisite! Wouldst thou like some, shopkeep?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I'll pass. I'm not too fond of sweets myself. Please, don't worry about me. Just enjoy it yourself.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I see. 'Tis a shame, but pray mind not if I do—
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Saga!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Whoa—
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Lava, why the commotion? I well nigh spilled my sesame soup...
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: So... you remember who I am?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Beg pardon?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Oh... I see. That must have left you quite flabbergasted.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Master, do you know what's happened?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: As I said before, I have spent many a moon inside this scroll. It can hardly be called an astute observation.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: For those not originally from the scroll, suppose we all have an eye each. With four of us, and that makes four eyes.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: As we fall asleep, we close our eyes. With that, there is no longer anyone gazing upon its scenery... and slowly it returns to the way it was. By the time we open our eyes and lay them upon it yet again, everything has gone back to its original shape and form.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: 'Tis what happens every time we awaken here. I have long grown accustomed to this anomaly.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: So... we're really inside a... painting?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hm? Have I not said as much?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Saga, is this going to affect our thought process... the way we think?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hm, now I wonder? Naught has ever seemed particularly strange to me...?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: That's just how you've always been.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Thanks to your monastery's head priest, you're no less familiar with world affairs despite your isolation from the outside world. On the contrary. Since you left Higashi, each step you've taken helped broaden your horizons, and though you may be directionless, you have never let that dampen your spirits.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: When life gives you lemons, if you then proceed to make lemonade, you would of course think nothing of them.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: To most people, this is nothing but a dream. The longer you're here, the easier it is to forget the things that should have been natural. The longer you're here, the more you come to accept the place as natural.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: In the end, you come to know the painting, and the painting comes to know you. You have become one with the painting, never to leave again.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Oh! So this is what you meant when you had me look for Lava! My, my. How dimwitted of me.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hey, Lava? I noticed it yesterday, but... there's no Originium here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I can't imagine building a village of this size without any Originium at all. Not even villages without any kind of mobility, in the most remote parts of Yen where Catastrophes rarely happen, can get by without any.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hold on, Dawn, what about you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I am but a local shopkeeper.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: But you remember everything that happened yesterday...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: To me, yesterday is today, and today is still tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I promised her as much, after all...
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I know that I am not the real 'me,' but does it matter? That doesn't change who I am.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: My apologies, but I'm afraid... you've lost me.
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Out of the goodness of your hearts, you gave this village the helping hand it needed in its time of need, but... it was all futile and pointless.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Sorry for not being more forthcoming before. At the time, we still had a guest in P'o-shan. It looks like she is already gone, though.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I'm sorry you had to go through such a fright yesterday. It must have been a disaster.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Hm? That guest thou speakest of... It cannot be...?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: That's all I can say, I'm afraid.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Very well. Methinks I know who it is.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Let's stop it with the riddles—Okay, let's say this is really just a painting. How did we get here?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I'm afraid I can't give you the answer to that either.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: My goodness. What are we meant to do with all this secrecy?
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Is that because... the people you've mentioned... are one and the same?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Excellent deduction.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Where is she?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Not here.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Who is she...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You know her.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Shh.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Do not speak her name, please.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: She's not one to do something like this without cause. Actually, she usually tries to avoid trouble when she can.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I suppose you've crossed paths with her before...?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Yes... And if it's her, then it all makes sense...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: This P'o-shan is the moon in the water.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Well, even if I do not ring the bell myself, there is bound to be someone else in town who would take on that responsibility. 'Tis a shame... I quite enjoy ringing bells myself.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Is this... the signal that the Ink Spirits are about to attack?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Yes, and it might have been because I told you the truth... But now that you know the residents here can't be harmed, this should be much easier than it was yesterday.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Just find somewhere to hide. You could also go east. to the Tung-shêng River. There is nothing there. It's a safe place for you to hide.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Be extra careful, though. If you go any further east past the easternmost part of the river, you will reach Mt. Hung-tung to the west of here.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: The Ink Spirits should calm down before long.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: So what are these monsters?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: They are the brushstrokes she sprawls when she is in a bad mood. You could say they are her musings.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: F-Find a place to hide? I'd rather not sit back and watch that all happen again...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: You saw Little Ah Jan crying her eyes out. It was heartbreaking, I tell you...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Just remember this is all fake.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: What if it's not?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You have seen it with your own eyes that it is.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Still though...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Still though, I don't want to have to hear those screams again. I'm sick of it.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We just need to go west and take care of all those monsters over there, right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Exactly! If it puts our minds at ease, why does it matter if we fish the moon in the water?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I shall go with you!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: W-Wait!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Calm down~ If we just take it slow, this actually isn't all that hard~ Right, Nothing, mate?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: H-Haha, I'll be sure to lend my assistance this time...
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: Wait! Hold on, my benefactor! You forgot your crossbow!
attributes.name: Mr.Nothing

attributes.content: She has the right of it.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I just can't imagine why you have to keep these good people in here...
attributes.name: Dawn
